Comments_List: Great introduction to math research and writing math papers. Great way to have an independent study in a field of interest and present on your findings.
More organization in due dates/expectations/oral exam dates and exposure to old example projects. My advisor did a wonderful job of being engaged and making sure I learned as much as possible.
100%! if you have an advisor you like it is a wonderful opportunity! highly recommend if you are able to self motivate.

Yes! Choose a good advisor and run with whatever math-based project you want. The department is happy to support you in your own research on a wide variety of topics, so choose something you're interested in and go for it!
